snippet: Jenny Chuasiriporn’s performance at the U.S. Women’s Open in 1998 thrust her into the spotlight but also ushered in the beginning of the end of her golf career.
abstract: Sudden-death playoff between Se Ri Pak and Jenny Chuasiriporn in the 1998 United States Women's Open golf tournament is revisited.
lead_paragraph: Jenny Chuasiriporn’s performance at the U.S. Women’s Open in 1998 thrust her into the spotlight but also ushered in the beginning of the end of her golf career.

headline.seo: For Jenny Chuasiriporn, U.S. Women’s Open Playoff Loss Was a Turning Point
headline.main: For Amateur, Open Was Highlight, and a Turning Point to a New Life
headline.print_headline: For Amateur, ’98 Open Was Highlight, and Turning Point
